# Basic ggplot2

Providing only data will results in a empty plot:

```{r only-data}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data = mtcars)
```

so add an aesthetic. The plot will still be empty since no geom is added.

```{r simple-aes}
ggplot(data = mtcars, mapping = aes(x = mpg, y = disp))
```

Add a geom to add a layer.

```{r simple-geom}
ggplot(data = mtcars, mapping = aes(x = mpg, y = disp)) + 
geom_point()
```

Add colors based on a variable

```{r color-aes}
ggplot(data = mtcars, mapping = aes(x = mpg, y = disp, colour = as.factor(gear))) + 
geom_point()
```
